title: Trump Says He Discussed Biden in Call With Ukraine’s President
text:
WASHINGTON—President Trump confirmed Sunday that he discussed Joe Biden with Ukraine’s president during a July call, a conversation that has prompted Democrats to accuse the president of wrongfully pressuring a foreign leader to investigate a political opponent.

Scrutiny over Mr. Trump’s interactions with Ukraine has ricocheted across Washington and onto the campaign trail, spurring new calls for impeachment proceedings to begin, after The Wall Street Journal reported that the president repeatedly pressured new Ukrainian President...
description: President Trump confirmed that he discussed Joe Biden with Ukraine’s president during a July call, a conversation that has prompted Democrats to accuse the president of wrongfully pressuring a foreign leader to investigate a political opponent.
